name: Seed Dispensary
description:
When you play a Support Card with an original cost of at least 2 Elemental Dice: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a Support Card with an original cost of at least 2 Elemental Dice: </color>Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a Support Card with an original cost of at least 2 Elemental Dice: </color>Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>
storytext: A special container obtained from Madame Ping. According to her, this dispensary has the power to "generate seeds"...
